example_input.prompt: It was a dark and stormy night

example_output.output: It was a dark and stormy night, and the wind was blowing in the direction of the west. The wind had been blowing for a long time, but it was now blowing very hard. It was like a hurricane, with a great storm of wind, which was coming in at a very rapid rate. I was awakened by the sound of a heavy bang, as if it had struck the roof of a house. My father was standing in his room, looking
